data.name: Naga
data.description:
The Ancients - Naga [E]
Units:
+2 armor
+15% buy cooldown

Buildings:
+1 armor

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Armor

Magic:
Abolish Magic (Dispels buffs from units)
Mana Burn (Burns 100 mana to 1 units)
Water Splash (Deals 100 damage in line)

Traits: Strong race, proficient in ancient arcane arts and magic neutralization. Yet it struggles to establish foothold on surface world. Unit supply is limited and buildings lack solid foundations.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Brilliance Aura
auras.description:
+0.1 MP/s to units and buildings
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Arcane Aura
auras.description:
+6 HP/s unit regeneration
(affects organic units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Inspiration Aura
auras.description:
+20% unit damage
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: The Betrayer's Forces [W]
bonuses.description:
Illidan

Hero Unit (Melee/Ranged)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/12/16/20/28
Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Null Field (Disable Spell)
silences for 20-32s
(doesn't affect Special unit)
(also affects buildings)
(60 second cooldown)

Double Blades (Passive Spell)
Chance for double attack 10-70%

Flames of Azzinoth (Summoning Spell)
summons 2 Demons for 60-90s
(60 second cooldown)

Metamorphosis (Self Spell)
600-1800 HP, 25% AS bonus, +50 damage
(lasts 45s, has 100s cooldown)

Type: Hero Power

(+10/15/20/25% damage)
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Concussion (Disable Spell)
(Gives enemy 25% chance to miss)
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Upgrades used:
Arcane Magic (Upgrades Abilities)
Razorspine Scales
Highborne Blood

bonuses.description:
Icreases Shrine of Azshara and Gorgon mana by 10%. Unlocks more upgrades inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Shrine spells by 30%.

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

Hydra Heads (Passive Spell)

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Nazjatar Gate [C]
bonuses.description:
Our Queen Azshara, in pursuit of power has gone too far. However, she managed to make a deal with the Old Gods, saving us. Or perhaps, dooming us?

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: The Choice
spells.description:
Choose between praying to Azshara, or succumbing to N'zoth, with their own advantages and demands. When you reach max Worship with either, you receive their Favor. Can only receive one Favor.
Gain 1 mana every 5 min. Increases by 1 whenever you upgrade your main building.

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: Azshara's Blessing [Q]
spells.description:
Increase Azhshara's Worship by 3%
(30 sec cooldown)

spells.name: N'zoth's Curse [Z]
spells.description:
Increase N'zoth's Worship by 2%
(30 sec cooldown)

spells.name: Nazjatar Gate
spells.description:
Azshara's Blessing:
Your units have 0% chance to evolve when they spawn from barracks. Increase by 3% with every Azhara's Blessing upgrade. If maxed, your Heroes gain +10 HP/sec, +5 armor when summoned, for 60 sec

N'zoth's Curse:
Your units have 0% chance to transform when they die. Increase by 2% with every N'zoth's Curse upgrade. If maxed, gain Madness Aura in main building: 15% dmg reduction, -5 MP/sec in 3000 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Mighty Blow
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun with extra dmg
Affects: Myrmidon and Purple Makrura
(does not affect Special unit)
(has 0.5s duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 10% for 10 damage, 1.2s stun
Lv2: 20% for 20 damage, 1.4s stun
Lv3: 30% for 30 damage, 1.6s stun
Lv4: 40% for 40 damage, 1.8s stun

towerUpgrades.name: Hardened Scales
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage block
Affects: Siren and Myrmidon

Lv1: 20% to block 10 damage
Lv2: 35% to block 20 damage
Lv3: 50% to block 30 damage
Lv4: 65% to block 40 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Mild Acid
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and movement slow
Affects: Snap Dragon and Tidal Guardian

Lv1: 6 dmg/s, 5% slow for 5 sec
Lv2: 12 dmg/s, 10% slow for 6 sec
Lv3: 18 dmg/s, 15% slow for 7 sec
Lv4: 24 dmg/s, 20% slow for 8 sec

towerUpgrades.name: High Preasure Glands
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus range and attack rate
Affects: Snap Dragon and Couatl

Lv1: +25 range, +6% attack rate
Lv2: +50 range, +12% attack rate
Lv3: +75 range, +18% attack rate
Lv4: +100 range, +24% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Highborne Blood
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus HP and regeneration
Affects: Myrmidon, Gorgon and Siren

Lv1: +20 hit points and +1.5 HP/s
Lv2: +40 hit points and +3 HP/s
Lv3: +60 hit points and +4.5 HP/s
Lv4: +80 hit points and +6 HP/s

towerUpgrades.name: Cleaving Attack
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: splash damage in 125 AoE
Affects: Siren and Myrmidon

Lv1: 8% area damage
Lv2: 16% area damage
Lv3: 24% area damage
Lv4: 32% area damage

towerUpgrades.name: Corrosive Spit
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: acid spit ability
Affects: Couatl
(splashes in 300 AoE)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: -2 armor, 4 dmg/s for 12 sec
Lv2: -4 armor, 8 dmg/s for 14 sec
Lv3: -6 armor, 12 dmg/s for 16 sec
Lv4: -8 armor, 16 dmg/s for 18 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Adaptation
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and HP regeneration
Affects: Snap Dragon and Sea Turtle

Lv1: +4/12 dmg, +1.5 HP/s
Lv2: +8/24 dmg, +3 HP/s
Lv3: +12/36 dmg, +4.5 HP/s
Lv4: +16/48 dmg, +6 HP/s

towerUpgrades.name: Purple Makrura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Crab Meat (heals allies)
restores 20/40/60/80 HP upon death
Lv2: has Bleed (reduce unit's speed)
15%/30%/45% chance, -25% speed for 60 sec
Lv3: has Deathrattle (AoE increase damage)
+15/25% damage in 500 AoE upon death
(does not affect Special unit)
Lv4: has Giant Claw (chance to kill)
20% to instantly kill an enemy

t1spell.name: Eruption [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 300 damage in 170 AoF.
Stuns for 8 seconds.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Lightning Storm [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends tidal waves in all directions.
Each shockwave deals 700 damage.
